43 const static std::string PANGO_MAGIC = "PANGO";
44 
45 const unsigned int TAG_LENGTH = 3;
46 
47 #define PANGO_TAG(a,b,c) ( (c<<16) | (b<<8) | a)
48 const uint32_t TAG_PANGO_HDR = PANGO_TAG('L', 'I', 'N');
49 const uint32_t TAG_PANGO_SYNC = PANGO_TAG('S', 'Y', 'N');
50 const uint32_t TAG_PANGO_STATS = PANGO_TAG('S', 'T', 'A');
51 const uint32_t TAG_ADD_SOURCE = PANGO_TAG('S', 'R', 'C');
52 const uint32_t TAG_SRC_JSON = PANGO_TAG('J', 'S', 'N');
53 const uint32_t TAG_SRC_PACKET = PANGO_TAG('P', 'K', 'T');
54 const uint32_t TAG_END = PANGO_TAG('E', 'N', 'D');
55 #undef PANGO_TAG
56 
57 struct PANGOLIN_EXPORT PacketStreamSource
58 {
59  std::string driver;
60  int id;
61  std::string uri;
62  json::value info;
63  json::value meta;
64  int64_t version;
65  int64_t data_alignment_bytes;
66  std::string data_definitions;
67  int64_t data_size_bytes;
68 };
69 
70 typedef unsigned int PacketStreamSourceId;

73 int64_t PlaybackTime_us();
74 
75 PANGOLIN_EXPORT
76 void SetCurrentPlaybackTime_us(int64_t time_us = 0);

78 class PANGOLIN_EXPORT PacketStreamWriter
79 {
80 public:
81  PacketStreamWriter();
82  PacketStreamWriter(const std::string& filename, unsigned int buffer_size_bytes = 10000000);
83  void Open(const std::string& filename, unsigned int buffer_size_bytes = 10000000);
84 
85 
86  ~PacketStreamWriter();
87 
88  PacketStreamSourceId AddSource(
89  const std::string& source_driver,
90  const std::string& source_uri,
91  const json::value& json_header = json::value(),
92  const size_t packet_size_bytes = 0,
93  const std::string& packet_definitions = ""
94  );
95 
96  void WriteSourcePacketMeta(PacketStreamSourceId src, const json::value& json);
97 
98  void WriteSourcePacket(PacketStreamSourceId src, const char* data, size_t n);
99 
100  void WritePangoHeader();
101 
102  void WriteStats();
103 
104  void WriteSync();
105 
106 protected:
107  inline void WriteCompressedUnsignedInt(size_t n)
108  {
109  while(n >= 0x80) {
110  writer.put( 0x80 | (n & 0x7F) );
111  n >>= 7;
112  }
113  writer.put( (unsigned char)n );
114  }
115 
116  inline void WriteTimestamp()
117  {
118  const int64_t time_us = PlaybackTime_us();
119  writer.write((char*)&time_us, sizeof(int64_t));
120  }
121 
122  inline void WriteTag(const uint32_t tag)
123  {
124  writer.write((char*)&tag, TAG_LENGTH);
125  }
126 
127  std::vector<PacketStreamSource> sources;
128  threadedfilebuf buffer;
129  std::ostream writer;
130 
131  unsigned int bytes_written;
132 };
133 
134 class PANGOLIN_EXPORT PacketStreamReader
135 {
136 public:
137  ~PacketStreamReader();
138  PacketStreamReader();
139  PacketStreamReader(const std::string& filename, bool realtime = true);
140 
141  void Open(const std::string& filename, bool realtime = true);
142  void Close();
143 
144  inline const std::vector<PacketStreamSource>& Sources() const
145  {
146  return sources;
147  }
148 
149  bool ReadToSourcePacketAndLock(PacketStreamSourceId src_id);
150 
151  void ReleaseSourcePacketLock(PacketStreamSourceId src_id);
152 
153  // Should only read once lock is aquired
154  inline std::basic_istream<char>& Read(char* s, size_t n)
155  {
156  return reader.read(s,n);
157  }
158 
159 protected:
160  inline int64_t ReadTimestamp()
161  {
162  int64_t time_us;
163  reader.read((char*)&time_us, sizeof(int64_t));
164  return time_us;
165  }
166 
167  inline size_t ReadCompressedUnsignedInt()
168  {
169  size_t n = 0;
170  size_t v = reader.get();
171  while( v & 0x80 ) {
172  n |= v & 0x7F;
173  n <<= 7;
174  v = reader.get();
175  }
176  return n|v;
177  }
178 
179  void ProcessMessage();
180  void ProcessMessagesUntilSourcePacket(int& nxt_src_id, int64_t &time_us);
181 
182  bool ReadTag();
183  void ReadHeaderPacket();
184  void ReadSourcePacketMeta(json::value &json);
185  void ReadNewSourcePacket();
186  void ReadStatsPacket();
187  void ReadOverSourcePacket(PacketStreamSourceId src_id);
188  uint32_t next_tag;
189 
190  std::vector<PacketStreamSource> sources;
191 
192  std::ifstream reader;
193  boostd::mutex read_mutex;
194 
195  int packets;
196  bool realtime;
197 };
198 
199 }
